introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: {{platformName}} Exchange (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "our company") respects the privacy of our users and strives to protect personal information. This Privacy Policy explains the types of information collected when using our services, how it is used, and how it is protected.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
items: Name, email address, phone number
Document information for identity verification
Transaction history and account balance information
Wallet addresses and transaction data

technicalInfo.title: Technical Information
items: IP address, browser type, device information
Login information and session data
Information collected through cookies and similar technologies

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Information Use
items: Account creation, management, and identity verification
Execution, settlement, and recording of transactions
Fulfillment of legal obligations and compliance assurance
Prevention, detection, and investigation of fraudulent activities
Provision of customer support
Service improvement and development of new features

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We will not disclose your personal information to third parties except in the following cases:
items: When disclosure is required by law
When you have provided consent
When disclosure is necessary for service provision to outsourcing partners
In the event of corporate restructuring such as mergers or acquisitions

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. This includes encryption technology, access controls, and regular security audits.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Right to request disclosure, correction, or deletion of personal information
Right to request cessation of personal information use
Right to data portability
Right to opt-out of marketing emails

cookies.title: 7. About Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze services. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may be limited.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Policy
changes.content: This Privacy Policy may be updated due to changes in laws or service improvements. If there are important changes, we will notify you through website announcements or email.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "these Terms") define the conditions for using the cryptocurrency trading services (hereinafter referred to as "the Services") provided by {{platformName}} Exchange (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "our company"). Please read these Terms carefully and agree to them before using the Services.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.intro: The Services provide the following functions:
items: Trading and transactions of cryptocurrency
Cryptocurrency storage through wallet functionality
Cryptocurrency deposits and withdrawals
Management and viewing of transaction history
Other related services determined by our company

eligibility.title: 3.1 Eligibility
items: Individuals or corporations 18 years of age or older
Persons residing in Japan
Persons who can submit identity verification documents
Persons who meet the conditions determined by our company

information.title: 3.2 Registration Information
information.content: Users must register accurate and up-to-date information and update it promptly when changes occur. If false information is registered, your account may be suspended.

fees.title: 4.1 Trading Fees
fees.content: Fees determined by our company apply to each transaction. Fees may be changed without prior notice.

limits.title: 4.2 Trading Limits
items: Setting daily trading limits
Limits based on identity verification levels
Trading suspension during system maintenance
Emergency suspension during market anomalies

prohibitedActions.title: 5. Prohibited Actions
prohibitedActions.intro: Users must not engage in the following actions:
items: Money laundering or other money laundering activities
Unauthorized access or attacks on systems
Providing false information or impersonating others
Actions that infringe on third-party rights
Actions that violate public order and morals
Actions that violate laws and regulations
Other actions deemed inappropriate by our company

userResponsibility.title: 6.1 User Responsibilities
items: Proper password management
Setting up two-factor authentication
Regular password changes
Immediate reporting of suspected unauthorized access

companyEffort.title: 6.2 Our Efforts
companyEffort.content: We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your assets and information.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: We are not responsible for the following:
items: Losses due to cryptocurrency price fluctuations
Damages caused by user operational errors
Hacking or phishing by third parties
Damages caused by communication or system failures
Damages caused by force majeure such as natural disasters

serviceChanges.title: 8. Service Changes and Suspension
serviceChanges.content: We may change or suspend the content of the Services with prior notice. However, in emergencies, we may suspend without prior notice.

termsChanges.title: 9. Changes to Terms
termsChanges.content: These Terms may be changed due to changes in laws or service improvements. Changed Terms become effective upon publication on the website.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by Japanese law, and any disputes regarding these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court as the court of first instance.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

warnings.content: Cryptocurrency trading involves high risk. Be sure to understand the risks before investing, and we recommend trading only with funds you can afford to lose.

priceVolatility.title: 1. Price Volatility Risk
priceVolatility.content: Cryptocurrency prices are extremely volatile and can fluctuate significantly in short periods.

specificRisks.title: Specific Risks
items: Possibility of price fluctuations of 50% or more in a single day
Possibility of investment principal falling significantly
Rapid price changes due to market illiquidity
Sudden price changes due to external factors (regulations, news, etc.)

liquidity.title: 2. Liquidity Risk
liquidity.content: Depending on market conditions, you may not be able to buy or sell at your desired price or time.
items: Difficulty trading cryptocurrencies with low trading volume
Trading suspension during market turmoil
Orders not executing or executing at less favorable prices than expected

technical.title: 3. Technical Risks
technical.content: Since cryptocurrencies are based on new technology, technical problems may occur.

platform.title: Platform Risks
items: Trading suspension due to system failures
Inability to access due to server downtime
Feature limitations during maintenance

blockchain.title: Blockchain Risks
items: Network forks
Delays or failures in transfers
Smart contract bugs

security.title: 4. Security Risks
security.content: Due to the nature of digital assets, security risks exist.

hacking.title: Hacking and Theft Risk
hacking.content: Theft of assets due to unauthorized access to exchanges or personal wallets

phishing.title: Phishing Scams
phishing.content: Theft of credentials through fake websites and emails

keyLoss.title: Private Key Loss
keyLoss.content: Permanent inability to access assets due to loss of private keys

regulatory.title: 5. Regulatory Risk
regulatory.content: Changes in cryptocurrency regulations by governments may affect trading.
items: Changes in legal status or trading restrictions/bans
Increased tax burden due to tax changes
Revocation of business licenses or business suspension of exchanges
Strengthening of international remittance regulations

operational.title: 6. Operational Risk
operational.content: There are also risks related to the exchange operating company.
items: Bankruptcy or business suspension of the operating company
Loss of customer assets due to inadequate management systems
Misappropriation of assets due to internal fraud
Business improvement orders by regulatory authorities

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This Risk Disclosure explains major risks related to cryptocurrency trading, but does not cover all risks. Investment decisions are your own responsibility.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about risks, please feel free to contact us.
